mapper.select: select e.id, e.username, e.name, e.gender, e.phone, e.job, e.salary, e.image, e.entry_date, e.dept_id, e.create_time, e.update_time, d.name as dept_name, eexpr.id as expr_id, eexpr.emp_id, eexpr.begin, eexpr.end, eexpr.company, eexpr.job as expr_job from emp e left join emp_expr eexpr on e.id = eexpr.emp_id left join dept d on e.dept_id = d.id where e.id = #{id}

select e.id, e.username, e.name, e.gender, e.phone, e.job, e.salary, e.image, e.entry_date, e.dept_id, e.create_time, e.update_time, d.name as dept_name from emp as e left join dept as d on e.dept_id = d.id

SELECT CASE WHEN job=1 THEN '班主任' WHEN job=2 THEN '讲师' WHEN job=3 THEN '学工主管' WHEN job=4 THEN '教研主管' WHEN job=5 THEN '咨询师' ELSE '其他' END as pos, COUNT(*) as num FROM emp GROUP BY pos ORDER BY num DESC;
SELECT if(gender=1,'男','女') as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM emp GROUP BY gender
